amendment.description: An amendment numbered 31 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to require the VA to report on how many delinquent payments by the VA to vendors and contractors there are and the total amount of money.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson, E. B. amendment (A062) Agreed to by voice vote.
